Description: The Flight into Egypt; after Raphael; the Virgin and Child seated in frontal view on the donkey; Joseph following them at left, holding two sticks; with ruins, obelisks and pyramids in background. Colour woodcut printed from two blocks, the line block in dark pink/red, the tone block in a lighter shade of pink
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (2.I)
Savage 2021 / Early Colour Printing: German Renaissance Woodcuts at the British Museum (70)
